text:
Paul Okalik (,; born May 26, 1964) is a Canadian politician. He is the first Inuk member and first first Premier of Nunavut.
On November 4, 2010, he was elected Speaker of the Legislative Assembly of Nunavut. Okalik represented the electoral district of Iqaluit West until April 6, 2011. He returned to the Legislative Assembly in 2013 until being defeated in the 2017 general election.

annotations.surface_form: Speaker of the Legislative Assembly of Nunavut
